body_html: According to the problem that bazel can not fetch the sources behind a proxy, I used a modified bazel from https://github.com/ixuexi/bazel, which using wget to download sources instead. However, the problem is caused by the bazel version. I updated bazel to version 0.11.0. The proxy problem of bazel have been solved by installing bazel without JDK, setting cntlm proxy and adding certificate to system JDK. And then, it works now.

body: According to the problem that bazel can not fetch the sources behind a proxy, I used a modified bazel from https://github.com/ixuexi/bazel, which using wget to download sources instead. However, the problem is caused by the bazel version. I updated bazel to version 0.11.0. The proxy problem of bazel have been solved by installing bazel without JDK, setting cntlm proxy and adding certificate to system JDK. And then, it works now.
